titleInfo.title: EVENTS AND PIECEWISE DETERMINISTIC DYNAMICS IN EVENT-ENHANCED QUANTUM-THEORY

mods.abstract: We enhance the standard formalism of quantum theory to enable events. The concepts of experiment and of measurement are defined. Dynamics is given by Liouville's equation that couples a quantum system to a classical one. It implies a unique Markov process involving quantum jumps, classical events and describing sample histories of individual systems.
